title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - November 18, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - November 18, 2021
description:
Gary and Mark connect to play an instantly legendary video clip of the lawyer for 'QAnon Shaman' responding to a question about former President Trump and then dive head first into the wild updates from the Kyle Rittenhouse trial.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
